00006	class CineKiller extends Trigger
00007		HideCategories(force,lightcolor,lighting,rollof,sound);
00008	
00009	VAR() Pawn InnocentVictim;
00010	//#exec Texture Import File=Textures\Cine_ico.pcx Name=Cine_ico Mips=Off
00011	EVENT Trigger(actor Other, pawn EventInstigator )
00012	{
00013		InnocentVictim.TakeDamage( 2000, InnocentVictim, InnocentVictim.Location, vect(0,0,0), Class'XIII.DTSureStunned' );
00014		Destroy();
00015	}
